name: Ace Wing
description:
Ace Wing was made in less than a week as an entry into the GM20 game jam. All assets including art, code, sounds, and music were made by me during the jam period. The ONLY exception to this is the font used.

Ace Wing is a short shoot 'em up about blasting away star fighters and getting the highest score possible!   Controls Movement: A and D or arrow keys Shoot: Space Pause: Escape Overview Avoid Mines and Bullets
Destroy Enemy Star Fighters and Mines to Gain XP and Points Level up to Gain Upgrade Points

If you enjoyed this game and you want to see more of my work feel free to follow me on social media: Twitch Instagram Twitter
